lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Andy Roddick used their big serves to capture three-set victories in opening matches at the season-ending Tennis Masters Cup in Shanghai. Federer rallied past the defending champion David Nalbandian, 3-6, 6-1, 6-1, before Roddick defeated Ivan Ljubicic, 6-4, 6-7 (9), 6-1, in the other Red Group match. Last year, Federer beat Nalbandian to begin this event, which has the world’s top eight players. He was then upset by Nalbandian in five sets.
